item.title: Speeding up text pattern searching and sorting in PostgreSQL
item.description: Introduction Suppose you have a table with records that you want to be searchable by a textual attribute, such as name or title. You also need to sort those records in a certain way that is not necessarily linked to the name or title - for example, you want to display the most recent records, or the most popular ones, first. After a certain period, the table has grown in size and search has become very slow, so you need to speed it up somehow.
